keyValuePair.Value: %1s Makes Senior Debut

He's only just graduated from the youth team into senior football, but %1s put in his first performance today. He's young and full of potential. We've not seen much of him in first team action but we can soon expect to see a lot more.
%1s Makes Senior Debut

He's only just graduated from the youth team into senior football, but %1s put in his first performance today. He's young and full of potential. We've not seen much of him in first team action but we can soon expect to see a lot more.
Shock Debut For %1s

With the stakes so high, it was a surprise to see %1s promoted from the youth ranks to make his first team debut today. Afterwards, %2s explained his decision: "Sometimes it's good to try something different. We know all about %1s and I thought he was ready to make the step up."
Shock Debut For %1s

With the stakes so high, it was a surprise to see %1s promoted from the youth ranks to make his first team debut today. Afterwards, %2s explained his decision: "Sometimes it's good to try something different. We know all about %1s and I thought he was ready to make the step up."
Rising Star %1s Impresses

It's a big step up from youth team football to first team action. But %1s impressed in his first game at this level and definitely didn't look out of place in the company of senior team-mates and star opponents. A home-grown hero in the making, perhaps?
Rising Star %1s Impresses

It's a big step up from youth team football to first team action. But %1s impressed in his first game at this level and definitely didn't look out of place in the company of senior team-mates and star opponents. A home-grown hero in the making, perhaps?
%1s Stuns With Hat-Trick

People on the coaching staff at %2s have been excited about %1s for some time now. They've watched and waited while he's risen through the ranks at the club and emerged as a first team player. In today's game, %1s's reputation exploded, with the home-grown youngster smashing an incredible hat-trick, the first of his senior career. The lad himself will never forget it and neither will anyone who was there to witness a bit of %2s history being made.

New Boy %1s Scores

It's a very special moment for any player, especially one like %1s who's come up through the ranks. Only recently promoted from the youth team, the home-grown boy was today's hero. An excellent all-round performance was capped off with a stunning first senior goal for the club. "I hope this is just the start for me. I'm buzzing!" said a happy %1s after the game.
New Boy %1s Scores

It's a very special moment for any player, especially one like %1s who's come up through the ranks. Only recently promoted from the youth team, the home-grown boy was today's hero. An excellent all-round performance was capped off with a stunning first senior goal for the club. "I hope this is just the start for me. I'm buzzing!" said a happy %1s after the game.
Young %1s Proves Worth

%1s has grown up in the %2s youth system and hasn't looked out of place since being promoted to first team football. Neat and tidy as always, today %1s proved he isn't just there to make up the numbers. Delivering a first assist of his senior career, he gave the fans and his manager plenty to think about. There's a feeling around %2s that there's much more to come from this young man. The young man of the moment seems mature for his age: "It's just one game. I'm happy but I know I can always do better," he promised after the game.

A spectacular hat-trick from one of your youngsters, %1s, today.
A spectacular hat-trick from one of your youngsters, %1s, today.

It must be satisfying when you see a young player rise through the ranks and then announce himself like %1s did today with a spectacular hat-trick. The supporters love to see home-grown talent star for the first team. Have you got any more kids waiting for their chance?

It must be satisfying when you see a young player rise through the ranks and then announce himself like %1s did today with a spectacular hat-trick. The supporters love to see home-grown talent star for the first team. Have you got any more kids waiting for their chance?
He's a real talent, for sure. I trust the youngsters.
He's a real talent, for sure. I trust the youngsters.

That was a fantastic performance. We've been watching this young man develop for a while now and today he really took his chance. That's a big motivation for other boys in the youth team. And it tells me I'm able to trust the young talent we have at the club.

That was a fantastic performance. We've been watching this young man develop for a while now and today he really took his chance. That's a big motivation for other boys in the youth team. And it tells me I'm able to trust the young talent we have at the club.
It's about proving yourself week after week.

I'm delighted for %1s. That was a performance to remember and he's got the match ball to remind him. But it's just one game. You need consistency at the top level. And the right mentality. We'll have to see how other players from the youth team adapt before we decide they're ready to play for the first team every week.

I'm delighted for %1s. That was a performance to remember and he's got the match ball to remind him. But it's just one game. You need consistency at the top level. And the right mentality. We'll have to see how other players from the youth team adapt before we decide they're ready to play for the first team every week.
Let's not put pressure on the youngsters.

I know everybody gets excited after a performance like that. But we won't rush him and we won't rush the other young players we're bringing through from the youth team. They have a lot to prove so let's not put extra pressure on them by saying they should play every week.

I know everybody gets excited after a performance like that. But we won't rush him and we won't rush the other young players we're bringing through from the youth team. They have a lot to prove so let's not put extra pressure on them by saying they should play every week.
%1s had a real impact on the game. Will you promote more young players like him now?
%1s had a real impact on the game. Will you promote more young players like him now?

He's come through the ranks and now %1s is getting games with the first team. He made a real impact in today's game and even got a goal. Does that mean you're ready to promote more young players to the senior squad now?

He's come through the ranks and now %1s is getting games with the first team. He made a real impact in today's game and even got a goal. Does that mean you're ready to promote more young players to the senior squad now?
We have plenty of young talent at the club.

I've been pleased with how he's developed since we brought him into the senior squad and, of course, I'm happy that he had such a good game today. He's adapted very well to first team football and that gives me confidence that some of our other youth players may do the same.

I've been pleased with how he's developed since we brought him into the senior squad and, of course, I'm happy that he had such a good game today. He's adapted very well to first team football and that gives me confidence that some of our other youth players may do the same.
Well, it gives me something to think about!
Well, it gives me something to think about!

He did really well and I'm pleased with how he's developing. We have to win games and I'll be ready to pick other young players if I think they can help us do that. Let's see how they do in training. I don't make promises to them and I won't make promises to you either!

He did really well and I'm pleased with how he's developing. We have to win games and I'll be ready to pick other young players if I think they can help us do that. Let's see how they do in training. I don't make promises to them and I won't make promises to you either!
We'll take our time with the home-grown boys.

Look, that was a really promising performance from %1s. He's a talent. That's why I promoted him from the youth team. But we can't rush things. That only puts pressure on young players. They know they'll get a chance here but they know we'll look after them as well.

Look, that was a really promising performance from %1s. He's a talent. That's why I promoted him from the youth team. But we can't rush things. That only puts pressure on young players. They know they'll get a chance here but they know we'll look after them as well.
Is home-grown talent like %1s the future for this club?
Is home-grown talent like %1s the future for this club?

%1s covered every blade of grass, got himself a goal and was named Man of the Match. It's great for the fans to see a boy who's come through the ranks make an impact like that. Is it great for you, too? Is it part of your plan for the future to promote more lads from the youth team?

%1s covered every blade of grass, got himself a goal and was named Man of the Match. It's great for the fans to see a boy who's come through the ranks make an impact like that. Is it great for you, too? Is it part of your plan for the future to promote more lads from the youth team?
It's what I've been trying to do.
It's what I've been trying to do.

If players can come from our own youth system, it gives them an advantage. They understand the club and they already understand our philosophy when they're promoted to the first team. It's something I'm trying to do, giving our own kids a pathway. And, so far, they haven't let me down.

If players can come from our own youth system, it gives them an advantage. They understand the club and they already understand our philosophy when they're promoted to the first team. It's something I'm trying to do, giving our own kids a pathway. And, so far, they haven't let me down.
Kids are exciting but you can't always rely on them.

I'm always ready to give a young player his chance. Look at what happened today. What a performance! But that doesn't mean we will push players from the youth team straight into the first team every week. I have to make sure we win games and the young players need time to develop.

I'm always ready to give a young player his chance. Look at what happened today. What a performance! But that doesn't mean we will push players from the youth team straight into the first team every week. I have to make sure we win games and the young players need time to develop.
You can write headlines about him if you want!
Let's not rush into things.

Of course he had a great game and I'm very pleased for the boy. He's worked hard since I promoted him from the youth team and we have other players with potential, too. But I won't rush our youngsters. That just puts pressure on them and pressure on me! They'll play when I think they're ready.

Of course he had a great game and I'm very pleased for the boy. He's worked hard since I promoted him from the youth team and we have other players with potential, too. But I won't rush our youngsters. That just puts pressure on them and pressure on me! They'll play when I think they're ready.
MOTM Show From %1s

Recently promoted from the youth team, %1s looks ready to make a real impact at senior level now. He put in an impressive all-round performance today and delivered a key assist. Nobody could argue with the decision to award him Man Of The Match. "I can't believe it," said %1s afterwards. "I just go out and play. All I want is to do is my best for this club."
Dazzling %1s MOTM!

It was the kind of afternoon that reminds you why you love football: a young player, recently promoted from the youth team, puts in a dazzling all-round display and claims his first hat-trick at senior level as well as the Man Of The Match award. Wow! %1s looks a home-grown talent with a big future ahead of him. "I just feel lucky to be playing with these great players around me," he insisted afterwards. "The boss and the senior players made it easy for me to step up and I just wanted to pay them back!"

It was the kind of afternoon that reminds you why you love football: a young player, recently promoted from the youth team, puts in a dazzling all-round display and claims his first hat-trick at senior level as well as the Man Of The Match award. Wow! %1s looks a home-grown talent with a big future ahead of him. "I just feel lucky to be playing with these great players around me," he insisted afterwards. "The boss and the senior players made it easy for me to step up and I just wanted to pay them back!"
MOTM Show From %1s

Recently promoted from the youth team, %1s looks ready to make a real impact at senior level now. He put in an impressive all-round performance today and delivered a key assist. Nobody could argue with the decision to award him Man Of The Match. "I can't believe it," said %1s afterwards. "I just go out and play. All I want is to do is my best for this club."
A fantastic hat-trick for %1s. Can you find more young players like him?
A fantastic hat-trick for %1s. Can you find more young players like him?

People have been talking about %1s as a young player with potential for a while now. And supporters love to see home-grown players in the first team. A fantastic hat-trick today and voted Man of the Match. With %1s doing so well, surely you must be thinking about promoting more players from the youth team now?

People have been talking about %1s as a young player with potential for a while now. And supporters love to see home-grown players in the first team. A fantastic hat-trick today and voted Man of the Match. With %1s doing so well, surely you must be thinking about promoting more players from the youth team now?
We want to build a team around our own young players if we can.

I think our young players can look to that hat-trick performance as inspiration. We have other boys in the youth system here who have that sort of talent, for sure. I want them to develop the right mentality so they're ready for when their chance comes. If they can prove they're strong psychologically, then a team built around home-grown players is a possibility.

I think our young players can look to that hat-trick performance as inspiration. We have other boys in the youth system here who have that sort of talent, for sure. I want them to develop the right mentality so they're ready for when their chance comes. If they can prove they're strong psychologically, then a team built around home-grown players is a possibility.
I can't make promises. It's up to them.
I can't make promises. It's up to them.

I can't say for sure that the promising young players we have at the club will all take their chance when it comes. Not everybody is going to score a hat-trick and be Man of the Match! But promoting players to the senior squad is something I'm looking to do and I'm optimistic it can be part of our future.

I can't say for sure that the promising young players we have at the club will all take their chance when it comes. Not everybody is going to score a hat-trick and be Man of the Match! But promoting players to the senior squad is something I'm looking to do and I'm optimistic it can be part of our future.
I have to focus on winning games right now.
I have to focus on winning games right now.

I can't tell what will happen in future. I watch our young players in training. If I think a boy is ready, I'll give him a chance. His age doesn't matter to me. What matters is whether he can help us win football matches. This will be a long season, so I think our supporters will certainly see some of our other youngsters in action

Man of the Match and a killer pass for a goal. Are youngsters like %1s the future at this club?
Man of the Match and a killer pass for a goal. Are youngsters like %1s the future at this club?

Young %1s was excellent today. Named Man of the Match and helping with a killer pass to get an assist for a vital goal. He's come up through the ranks and now looks comfortable in the first team. Do players like him represent the future for the club?

Young %1s was excellent today. Named Man of the Match and helping with a killer pass to get an assist for a vital goal. He's come up through the ranks and now looks comfortable in the first team. Do players like him represent the future for the club?
A young player like him plays without fear.
I think this can be good for the team.

I like to give young players a chance. They lift the team and lift our supporters. And they're not frightened to go out and play. I think our youth coaches develop a good mentality in our home-grown boys so, if they're good enough, I will always be ready to give them games.

I like to give young players a chance. They lift the team and lift our supporters. And they're not frightened to go out and play. I think our youth coaches develop a good mentality in our home-grown boys so, if they're good enough, I will always be ready to give them games.
Ask me after 50 games!
Ask me after 50 games!

We've got lots of young players with real potential in our senior squad now and in the youth teams coming through. But you can never be sure whether a boy will adapt to first-team football. You ask me: will this youngster make it? I have to say: ask me again when he's played 50 games!

We've got lots of young players with real potential in our senior squad now and in the youth teams coming through. But you can never be sure whether a boy will adapt to first-team football. You ask me: will this youngster make it? I have to say: ask me again when he's played 50 games!
I take it game by game.
I take it game by game.

My first job here is to win games, so I must always make the decisions I think will give us positive results. I don't think you can put all the responsibility in big games on young players' shoulders. You have to be careful and develop their potential without damaging their confidence.

My first job here is to win games, so I must always make the decisions I think will give us positive results. I don't think you can put all the responsibility in big games on young players' shoulders. You have to be careful and develop their potential without damaging their confidence.
Gamble On MOTM %1s Pays Off

A big game means a big responsibility for a young player. And it needs a manager willing to take a gamble on youth. %2s gave %1s his chance today and the young home-grown talent repaid his manager's faith with a goal and a Man of the Match performance. The boss was delighted afterwards: "You know what they say: if you're good enough, you're old enough! %1s was great for us today."

%1s looked like he could handle the pressure. What about giving other youngsters a chance now?
%1s looked like he could handle the pressure. What about giving other youngsters a chance now?

You probably surprised quite a few people today. It was a really important game but that didn't stop you giving %1s a start. And he did pretty well for you! Can we expect to see more young players getting a chance in big matches now?

You probably surprised quite a few people today. It was a really important game but that didn't stop you giving %1s a start. And he did pretty well for you! Can we expect to see more young players getting a chance in big matches now?
Let's see if they can realise their potential.

I try to watch our youth teams play. I talk to the coaches. We have some lads with great potential coming through. Will they be good enough? We can only really expect to find out if we give them a chance. The biggest talents always show up in big games.

I try to watch our youth teams play. I talk to the coaches. We have some lads with great potential coming through. Will they be good enough? We can only really expect to find out if we give them a chance. The biggest talents always show up in big games.
I like lads such as %1s, but who knows?
I like lads such as %1s, but who knows?

I thought hard about putting him in the team today. I've been watching him closely since we promoted him to the senior squad. I thought he'd have a big-game mentality and it seems I was right. But every game's different and every player's different. I can't say definitely what will happen in future.

I thought hard about putting him in the team today. I've been watching him closely since we promoted him to the senior squad. I thought he'd have a big-game mentality and it seems I was right. But every game's different and every player's different. I can't say definitely what will happen in future.
Making promises doesn't help anyone.
Making promises doesn't help anyone.

If I say this lad will definitely get games or this lad is going to be a star, who does that help? It just puts pressure on the young player and it puts pressure on me, too. Management is about handling expectations not about making promises. So we'll wait and see how our young players develop. We have to find out if we can rely on them in the future.

If I say this lad will definitely get games or this lad is going to be a star, who does that help? It just puts pressure on the young player and it puts pressure on me, too. Management is about handling expectations not about making promises. So we'll wait and see how our young players develop. We have to find out if we can rely on them in the future.
You gave a youngster, %1s, a start today. Can we expect more decisions like that?
You gave a youngster, %1s, a start today. Can we expect more decisions like that?

Today's match had a lot riding on it and most people expected you to pick your most experienced team. Instead, you gave a home-grown youngster, %1s, his chance. Did you think that was a risk or does it give us an idea about how you're planning for the future here?

Today's match had a lot riding on it and most people expected you to pick your most experienced team. Instead, you gave a home-grown youngster, %1s, his chance. Did you think that was a risk or does it give us an idea about how you're planning for the future here?
I don't make decisions I haven't thought about!
I don't make decisions I haven't thought about!

I didn't just decide on the team on the morning of the game. I've been watching our young players develop and I think one or two of them are ready for first-team action. The young man looked ready to me. He's strong, quick and he has a good mentality. Those are the reasons I picked him. And I won't be afraid to pick other home-grown kids in the future.

I didn't just decide on the team on the morning of the game. I've been watching our young players develop and I think one or two of them are ready for first-team action. The young man looked ready to me. He's strong, quick and he has a good mentality. Those are the reasons I picked him. And I won't be afraid to pick other home-grown kids in the future.
You have to wait until the time's right.

The lad didn't just arrive at the club. He's been coming through our youth teams and now he's part of the senior squad. So it wasn't a spur-of-the-moment decision to play him. It's about watching a boy in training and then picking the right games for him to play in. I do what's best for the player and best for the club.

The lad didn't just arrive at the club. He's been coming through our youth teams and now he's part of the senior squad. So it wasn't a spur-of-the-moment decision to play him. It's about watching a boy in training and then picking the right games for him to play in. I do what's best for the player and best for the club.
I don't make promises I might not be able to keep!
I don't make promises I might not be able to keep!

Look, I'm not going to put pressure on a young player by promising that he'll play in a particular game. What I can promise is that I'll always pick a team that I think will win. If that team has one youngster in it or five or six, that doesn't concern me. I don't worry about age or experience. I just ask: is that player good enough to do a job for us today?

Look, I'm not going to put pressure on a young player by promising that he'll play in a particular game. What I can promise is that I'll always pick a team that I think will win. If that team has one youngster in it or five or six, that doesn't concern me. I don't worry about age or experience. I just ask: is that player good enough to do a job for us today?
A first display from %1s. Does that encourage you to try more young players?
A great display from %1s. Does that encourage you to try more young players?

You handed %1s his debut in today's game. A young player who's come up through the ranks, with a lot of expectation on his shoulders. Will he give you the confidence to try some of the other promising youngsters at the club?

You handed %1s his debut in today's game. A young player who's come up through the ranks, with a lot of expectation on his shoulders. But he handled the pressure and put in an excellent performance. Will that give you the confidence to try some of the other promising youngsters at the club?
I believe in our young players.
I believe in our young players.
I've been watching %1s train with us since he was promoted to the first team squad. I believe in his ability. And in the ability of several other players we've got coming through the ranks.

You're right. %1s was exceptional today, especially considering it was his first senior start. But I wasn't surprised that he handled himself well. I've been watching him train with us since he was promoted to the first team squad. I believe in his ability. And in the ability of several other players we've got coming through the ranks.
I'm always ready to give young players a chance.
I'm always ready to give young players a chance.

I know better than anyone how many promising young players we have coming through at the club. I give them the chance to be part of the first team squad and I play them when I think they're ready to handle the pressure. And you can expect a few more to be given a chance in the coming months.

I know better than anyone how many promising young players we have coming through at the club. I give them the chance to train with the senior players and to be part of the first team squad. I play them when I think they're ready to handle the pressure. And you can expect a few more to be given a chance in the coming months.
I like our young players but I won't just play them for the sake of it.
I like our young players but I won't just play them for the sake of it.

I'm always willing to give young players a chance when the time is right. But I won't just hand a lad his debut for the sake of it or because it's going to make a good headline for you guys. When I think a boy's ready is when he'll get a game.

I'm always willing to give young players a chance when the time is right. But I won't just hand a lad his debut for the sake of it or because it's going to make a good headline for you guys. When I think a boy's ready is when he'll get a game.
Great pass for the goal by %1s. Will he and other youngsters get more chances in future?
Great pass for the goal by %1s. Will he and other youngsters get more chances in future?

%1s put in a very mature performance today and it was a great assist for the goal. He's just one of many promising young players you have coming through at the club right now. Is it your plan to give more home-grown kids games in the coming weeks?
Well, if %1s is anything to go by, the kids are ready!

I'm very pleased for %1s. He's a boy who has been with us for many years now, developing his talent. And today I think he showed that he's ready to make an impact at first-team level. Maybe he sets an example. I've definitely got other young lads from the youth set-up who I'm planning to give opportunities to in the future.

I'm very pleased for %1s. He's a boy who has been with us for many years now, developing his talent. And today I think he showed that he's ready to make an impact at first-team level. Maybe he sets an example. I've definitely got other young lads from the youth set-up who I'm planning to give opportunities to in the future.
We won't be rushing him or any of our youngsters.
We must tread this carefully.

Look, he had a really promising game today. Very mature, as you say. And an assist. But I'm not going to rush him. And I won't rush any of the other youngsters we've got coming through at the club. They still have a lot to learn and we must give them time to develop.

Look, he had a really promising game today. Very mature, as you say. And an assist. But I'm not going to rush him. And I won't rush any of the other youngsters we've got coming through at the club. They still have a lot to learn and we must give them time to develop.
I don't want anyone putting extra pressure on our young players.
I don't want anyone putting extra pressure on our young players.

%1s had a really good game today and well done to him for that. But don't put extra pressure on him by assuming he'll play every game now and play at that same level. He's still got plenty to learn and we've got games of football to win along the way. All our youngsters know that they'll play when I think they're ready. They'll respect my decision on that.

%1s Is MOTM!

First team football has been a long time coming for %1s, who has been rising through the ranks for a while. But he's being given chances by the boss now and he's proving it's been worth the wait. Today he put in a surprisingly mature performance which saw him chosen as Man of the Match. His youth coaches must be proud of him. He already looks and sounds the part: "I just have to be patient," he said in his post-match TV interview. "I've got my whole career ahead of me, haven't I? I trust the manager's decisions."

Debut For Local Boy %1s

Today was a fixture with plenty at stake for both teams, so it was a surprise to everyone that %2s handed a debut to local boy %1s. Born and bred around the corner from the ground, you'd have expected nerves to show as the young man fulfilled a lifetime ambition. The Boss, it seems, knew better and %1s put in a display of real maturity and promise. The supporters are hoping the club have found a new hometown hero.
